title: Skill Usage Audit: Path & Context Confusion
description: Systemic audit of golem-powers skills. Claude gets confused between skill install dir (~/.claude/commands/), repo source dir (claude-golem/skills/), and cwd. Need consistent pattern for invoking skills and their scripts. Use /context7 at each step to research best practices.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Use /context7 to research Claude Code skill invocation patterns
Document the three contexts: skill install dir, repo source dir, user's cwd
Grep all skills for relative paths: ./scripts, ./prd-json, ./ patterns
Use /context7 to research shell script path resolution best practices
List each affected skill with its specific path issues
Use /context7 to research how other CLI tools handle script locations
Design standard: Option A (relative to SKILL.md), B (repo /scripts/), or C (env vars)
Document chosen standard in contexts/skill-authoring.md (create if needed)
Fix /prd-manager to follow the standard (highest priority)
Create MP story for fixing remaining skills systematically
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: AUDIT-001 establish skill path standards

notes:
COMPREHENSIVE FINDINGS:

1. WHAT CLAUDE RECEIVES:
   When skill loads, Claude sees: 'Base directory for this skill: /path/to/skill'
   This path IS provided but Claude doesn't always use it.

2. WHAT WORKS:
   ~/.claude/commands/golem-powers/prd-manager/scripts/run.sh --action=stats
   Result: Works (full path)

3. WHAT FAILS:
   ./scripts/run.sh --action=stats
   Result: 'no such file' (cwd is repo root, not skill dir)

4. SMART SCRIPTS (example: ralph-commit):
   Walks up from cwd to find prd-json/ directory
   Works from any subdirectory

5. DUMB SCRIPTS (example: prd-manager):
   Uses PRD_DIR=${PRD_DIR:-./prd-json}
   Only works if cwd has prd-json/ OR PRD_DIR is set

6. SKILLS WITH execute: FRONTMATTER:
   coderabbit, context7, create-pr, prd-manager, test-plan, etc.
   All use relative 'scripts/foo.sh' - assumed relative to skill dir

7. THE FIX OPTIONS:
   A) Claude always prefixes with 'Base directory' path
   B) Scripts detect their own location via BASH_SOURCE
   C) Scripts walk up to find project markers (prd-json/, package.json)

8. SPECIFIC TO CLAUDE-GOLEM REPO:
   This repo HAS skills/ directory locally AND prd-json/
   Other repos only have prd-json/, not skills/
   Confusion may be repo-specific where skill source exists alongside PRD
